page.title: 19SHOPPING IN BRANSTON
page.content: Branston is a very big village which has fourteen shops. There are two hairdressers, two news agents and two grocers' stores, one electrical goods shop and one garage, one pet shop which is closing down, two butchers, one post office, a Co-op and Galbraith's DIY and hardware store.There are also more shops opening on the Brookfields estate. Most shopkeepers here open from Monday to Saturday, but the Co-op is closed all day Monday and one newsagents and one grocers store are open on a Sunday. Not many shopkeepers take cheques and hardly any take credit cards. We asked people what they thought about the village shops. Most liked the shops, especially the Co-op but a lot also shopped in Lincoln once a week.
